titleStmt.title: A godlie treatise of the Church. Written by Robert Some..
titleStmt.author: Some, Robert, 1542-1609.

titleStmt.title: A godlie treatise of the Church. Written by Robert Some..
titleStmt.author: Some, Robert, 1542-1609.

notesStmt.note: Title within border of printer's ornaments, with the initials 'T D' in the lower inside corners; initials.
Colophon: Imprinted at London at the three Cranes in the Vintree by Thomas Dawson for George Bishop. 1583.
"You shall finde in the ende of this booke, A treatise against oppression."--t.p.
Second part has half-title, " A godlie and shorte treatise, against the foule and grosse sinne of oppression", and running title, "A godlie treatise against oppression".
Imperfect: tightly bound, stained, and with print show-through.
Reproduction of original in: Peterborough Cathedral Library (deposited at University of Cambridge).
